title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for the purpose of giving effect to the
heading: 1. These Rules may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Fire Protection)
text_raw:
1. These Rules may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Fire Protection) 

(Amendment) Rules 2025.
text_norm: 1 rule may cited merchant shipping (fire protection) (amendment) rule 2025

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for the purpose of giving effect to the
heading: 2. Schedule 15 to the Merchant Shipping (Fire Protection) Rules 2023 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. Schedule 15 to the Merchant Shipping (Fire Protection) Rules 2023 (S.I. 

No. 379 of 2023) is amended: 

(a) 

in the third entry relating to Drogheda, by substituting for the 
matter in column (3), for: 

“In Winter: 

No partially smooth waters” 

the following: 

“In Winter: 

In favourable weather only, within a radius of 1.3 nautical 
miles from the eastern tip of the north breakwater and 
terminating at the northern and southern foreshores 
respectively for vessels engaged in dredging operations 
only.”; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [62] 3 

(b) 

in the seventh entry relating to Howth Sound, by substituting for 
the matter in column (3), “Within a line from the North end of 
Eastern Breakwater to Thulla and south of a line drawn westward 
from Steer Rock”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 March, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [62]
text_norm: 2 schedule 15 merchant shipping (fire protection) rule 2023 (s.i no 379 2023) amended (a) third entry relating drogheda substituting matter column (3) winter partially smooth water following winter favourable weather within radius 1.3 nautical mile eastern tip north breakwater terminating northern southern foreshore respectively vessel engaged dredging operation only notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 7th march 2025 62 3 (b) seventh entry relating howth sound substituting matter column (3) within line north end eastern breakwater thulla south line drawn westward steer rock  given official seal 5 march 2025 darragh brien minister transport 4 62

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for the purpose of giving effect to the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Rules amend Schedule 15, Areas of Smooth Waters and Partially Smooth 
Waters, to the Merchant Shipping (Fire Protection) Rules 2023 (S.I. No. 379 of 
2023) in relation to the description of Areas of Partially Smooth Waters in 
Drogheda and Howth Sound. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [62] 5
